doc:
Extends the NoonAction service to add DBUI specifics
1) invokeAction is called w/ perspective and context bo, in addition to actionObj and argsObj.  Parameters are added depending on action type and provided perspective and context bo
2) when any action returns object w/ 'message', 'error' or 'warning' properties, alert is rendered in UI via DbuiAlert service
3) when any action returns object w/ 'action' property, action object is invoked, allowing for chaining behavior (e.g. webservice responding w/ re-direct)
name: DbuiAction
